forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. Showers this morning with mostly sunny conditions during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Rain showers this morning will give way to some sunshine for the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 57F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of an afternoon shower. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
